document.full_text: former ebay inc chief executive meg whitman will join leading silicon valley venture capital firm kleiner perkins caufield & byers, a source close to her said on tuesday.
document.title: meg whitman joins venture cap's kleiner perkins
lines_and_colors: former ebay inc chief executive meg whitman will join leading silicon valley venture capital firm kleiner perkins caufield & byers, a source close to her said on tuesday.
